sentence.Network_en: Participates in product design meetings for familiarization with project requirements and objectives.

sentence.Network_en: The familiarization with psychological features of young students may impose great impact on mind education effect.

sentence.Network_en: His familiarization with several operating system make him the best candidate for this position.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于熟悉好几种操作系统,他成了这个职位的最佳候选人.
